explanation: [0-0] In a room with a white floor, a tall boy wearing a black mask, white shirt, and blue jeans is leading a group of boys facing a group of girls. The tall boy and a girl with a low ponytail in a pink T-shirt extend their right hands. Both are wearing shoes that light up. The walls of the room are white and decorated with colorful English words. There are also brown pillars in the room.
[0-5] The tall boy and the girl with the low ponytail are playing rock-paper-scissors. The boy loses, and the girls cheer while the boys lower their heads in disappointment.
